descriptions:
["DescriptionAn exceptional opportunity for anyone looking to buy property in Dubai to acquire a stunningly located villa overlooking the 9th green of the championship Earth golf course. With breathtaking views of the Earth course, this property is located very close to the Clubhouse. Currently tenanted until March 2020, it will be available on a vacant basis for any end-user but also presents a good yield for an investor.
The ground floor hosts an open plan living and dining area which opens onto the landscaped garden with private swimming pool and amazing views over the golf course. A well appointed master bedroom leads off the living area, with fully fitted wardrobes, and a beautiful master bathroom suite.
The kitchen is fully fitted with Miele appliances, and has a large laundry/utility room with ample space for storage.
The first floor hosts a further 3 en-suite bedrooms.
The villa is equipped with a Bang & Olufsen audio visual system, and comes with a golf cart with which to enjoy the beauty of this exclusive golfing community.
An external maid's room and a double garage complete this property.
For further information, please contact Lisa Mackenzie on +971564847538 or email at lisa@exclusive-links.com."]

location1: ['Signature Villas Frond ADubai, Palm Jumeirah, Signature Villas']
descriptions:
['DescriptionUpon entering the double height hallway of this elegant villa you catch sight of the sea. Off the entrance hallway is a large reception room to the left, and the dining room to the right. Further towards the sea side there is the guest powder room. The dining room leads through to the kitchen and separate pantry area. On the beach side there is another large formal sitting room with large windows overlooking the sea and doors leading out to the gardens. The ground floor is completed by an ensuite guest bedroom overlooking the sea, a maids and drivers room.
Upstairs, there are a further 4 ensuite bedrooms, 3 of which have sea views. The master suite has access to a large sea facing terrace.
There is garage parking for 2 cars and room outside for a further 2.
To arrange a private viewing please call.']

descriptions:
["DescriptionGulf Sotheby's International Realty is pleased to represent this Renovated 6 Bedrooms Mediterranean Gallery Views Beachfront Signature villa with open sea views and magnificent architecture in the most sought-after locations in Dubai, Palm Jumeirah.
Located in the TIP of the Palm fronds, the sprawling 13,400 sq.ft area of the land and 7,000 of the Built-up Area of the villa combines stunning architecture. From the high-ceiling entrance hall and sea views, complete with refined pillars surrounding a water structure on a decorative flooring to the completely elegant white interior, all aspects of the property combine to create an ambiance of contemporary royalty. The property includes a full sea view Living rooms, kitchen, maid’s room, driver room, study room and the bedrooms, all en-suite, are located across both the floors.                                     The Kitchen had been renovated and extended, including the bathrooms and Master bedroom bathrooms had been extended in size with extra wardrobes. 
The flourishing backyard features a private garden with ample space to host those BBQ family dinners and a beautiful swimming pool with the stunning views of the direct beach and Full Marina Skyline Views.
This deluxe villa is ideal for families to enjoy a beachfront living with full privacy and experience in a luxury property at the tip of the frond of Palm Jumeirah. 
Contact Gulf Sothebys International Realty today for your private viewing of this extraordinary property."]
